addDeviceDescription: Configure your device settings to add it to your inventory
tryDifferentFilters: Try adjusting your filters or add a new device
name: Name
deviceNotFound: Device could not be found. It may have been deleted or you don't have permission to view it.

deleteDevice.title: Delete Device
deleteDevice.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the device "{{name}}"?
deleteDevice.warning: This action cannot be undone. All device data will be permanently removed.

basicInfoDescription: Enter the basic information for your device, such as name, description, and IP address.
standardConfigDescription: Configure standard device-specific settings like OS type, hostname, and credentials.
customConfigDescription: Select a plugin for your custom device and configure its connection parameters.
reviewDescription: Review your device configuration before creating it.
manualConnectionParams: Enter connection parameters for the plugin. These will be passed to the plugin when connecting to the device.
author: Author
selectOs: Select the operating system of your device
connectionParamsDescription: Configure the parameters needed to connect to your device using this plugin
jsonEditorDescription: Edit the connection parameters directly as JSON for advanced configuration
authDescription: Enter the authentication details for connecting to your device securely
advancedSettingsDescription: Configure additional settings for fine-tuning the device connection
timeoutDescription: Maximum time to wait when connecting to the device
noPluginsFound: No plugins found matching your search

operations.noParameters: This operation does not require any parameters.

noUiSchema: This plugin does not define a UI schema for parameter input. Use the JSON editor instead.
nameHint: A unique name to identify this device
ipAddressHint: IP address or hostname to connect to this device
descriptionHint: Optional description to provide additional information
hostnameHint: Hostname or IP to connect via SSH
deviceTypeDescription: Choose the type of device you want to add
pluginDescription: Select a plugin that matches your device type for specialized connection and monitoring
standardDeviceDescription: Standard devices connect via SSH to Linux, Windows or MacOS systems
customDeviceDescription: Custom devices use specialized plugins to connect to non-standard or proprietary systems
errorSavingDevice: An error occurred while saving the device. Please check your inputs and try again.

info.standardDevice: Standard devices connect using SSH protocols. Use this for typical Linux, Windows or MacOS servers and devices.
info.customDevice: Custom devices require a plugin to establish connection. Use this for specialized hardware, IoT devices, or systems with proprietary interfaces.

errorFetchDescription: There was a problem retrieving your devices. Please try again.
noDevicesMatchFilters: No devices match your current filters
noDevicesYet: No devices found in your inventory
addYourFirstDevice: Start by adding your first device to monitor
